ComicInfo.Title: Landlocked
ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales presents The Little Mermaid
ComicInfo.Summary:
Do you know the real story of the Little Mermaid?
When a young mermaid makes a wish to become human, her world will turn upside down and she will need to find the courage to confront her fears or perish at the hands of evil.
Zenescope's brand new re-imagining of a classic has arrived!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | David Finch & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Jason Metcalf & Stephen Schaffer | 4 | C | Cover C | Mirka Andolfo | 5 | RI | Super Rare Retailer Incentive Cover | David Finch & Ivan Nunes | 3 | RI | Ultra Rare Retailer Incentive Cover, Limited to 100 | Jamie Tyndall (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | RE | London Super Con Exclusive Cover, Limited to 500 | Jamie Tyndall (a) & Ula Mos (c) | 2 |
